allow: Bash(do sed -i '' 's|@/lib/games/hooks|../lib/hooks|g; s|@/lib/games/utils|../lib/utils|g; s|@/lib/games/metadata|./lib/metadata|g; s|@/lib/shared/hooks|../lib/hooks|g; s|@/lib/shared/utils|../lib/utils|g' "$file")
